mapper.select: select ft.id as id, ft.name as name, ut.point as point from user_fitness ut join fitness_type ft on ut.fitness_type_id = ft.id where ut.user_id = #{userId} and ft.id < 8;
mapper.insert: insert into fitness_measurement (value, level, fitness_type_id, user_id) value(#{value}, #{level}, #{fitnessTypeId}, #{userId})
